casebody.data:
527 A.2d 763 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. H. Hughes SPRAGINS. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 13,

Sept. Term, 1987.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. July 15, 1987.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment filed by H. Hughes Spragins in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 15th day of July, 1987,

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that H. Hughes Spragins be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland, and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of H. Hughes Spragins from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
